markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Glamorous Buckler](/Equipment.aspx?ID=734)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _glamorous buckler_ (Hardness 3, HP 6, BT 3) is lavishly decorated with gilding and inset gemstones that glitter in the light. While you have it raised, the _glamorous buckler_ grants you a +1 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48).

<document level="2" id="action-580" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Glamorous Buckler
